ID: CNZT477_00
From: Savio Salvador D'costa <Savio.Dcosta@nascodubai.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Diana Haydar <Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com>; Prashant Jha <Prashant.Jha@nascodubai.com>; Jagdish Laxman Nettimi <Jagdish.Laxman@nascodubai.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-04 18:31
Subject: Chalhoub Group - Insurance Portfolio Renewal - Expiry 23/09/2024  (KUWAIT POLICY)
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing fine.

 

As discussed today , with regards to the PAR policy of Habchi and Chalhoub for the current year 2024 -2025 , GIG has issued the policy this year in the UAE and not locally in Kuwait.

 

Please let us know if the same is fine so we can have this released to you or else incase you require GIG to issue the PAR policy locally in Kuwait through fronting please arrange to provide the TL copies & VAT of the insured for local policy document issuance In Kuwait.

 

Await your revert on the same in order to proceed further.

 

 

Savio Salvador D’Costa ACII FIII

Savio Salvador D’Costa ACII FIII

Nasco Middle East
P.O. Box 62528, Dubai, UAE

T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291  D +971 4 305 1697

M +971 56 8315060  E savio.dcosta@nascodubai.com <mailto:savio.dcosta@nascodubai.com>  
www.nascomiddleeast.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/yJCyCrMz4TxrO95IzhGi47UlF?domain=urldefense.com> 

 

“We wish to inform you that the Central Bank of the UAE has issued new regulations for Insurance Brokers, dated July 25, 2024. According to these regulations, Insurance Brokers are prohibited from collecting premiums under any circumstances. These regulations will come into effect on February 15, 2025. In compliance with these regulations, we will cease collecting premiums effective January 1, 2025. Henceforth, all premium payments should be made directly to the insurance providers as per the details mentioned in the insurance policy invoice”

 

 

 

 

 

Registered Name: Nasco M.E. Insurance Brokers LLC

Insurance Brokers License No. 167

A member of the Nasco Insurance Group

Henceforth, all premium payments should be made directly to the insurance providers as per the details mentioned in the insurance policy invoice”

Insurance Brokers License No. 167

From: Savio Salvador D'costa 
Sent: Friday, July 4, 2025 6:31 PM
To: Hagop Ghazarian <hagop.ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:hagop.ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Diana Haydar <Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com <mailto:Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com> >; Prashant Jha <Prashant.Jha@nascodubai.com <mailto:Prashant.Jha@nascodubai.com> >; Jagdish Laxman Nettimi <Jagdish.Laxman@nascodubai.com <mailto:Jagdish.Laxman@nascodubai.com> >
Subject: Chalhoub Group - Insurance Portfolio Renewal - Expiry 23/09/2024 (KUWAIT POLICY)

 

Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing fine.

 

As discussed today , with regards to the PAR policy of Habchi and Chalhoub for the current year 2024 -2025 , GIG has issued the policy this year in the UAE and not locally in Kuwait.

 

Please let us know if the same is fine so we can have this released to you or else incase you require GIG to issue the PAR policy locally in Kuwait through fronting please arrange to provide the TL copies & VAT of the insured for local policy document issuance In Kuwait.

 

Await your revert on the same in order to proceed further.

 

 

Savio Salvador D’Costa ACII FIII

Head – Non Marine

 



 

Nasco Middle East
P.O. Box 62528, Dubai, UAE

T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291  D +971 4 305 1697

M +971 56 8315060  E savio.dcosta@nascodubai.com <mailto:savio.dcosta@nascodubai.com>  
www.nascomiddleeast.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/bLJlCqMy4TG9nRJFXhqiEQuMu?domain=urldefense.com>
